snippet.title: A Clockwork Ley-Line: The Borderline of Dusk Trailer
snippet.description:
Leap into the world of magic, sorcery and the unknown in Unison Shift's A Clockwork Ley-Line: The Borderline of Dusk.
This is a Japanese modern fantasy adventure game/visual novel.
Featuring gorgeous artwork and great voice acting, the story unravels as you join the journey into the world of Ley-Line.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/620080/A_Clockwork_LeyLine_The_Borderline_of_Dusk/
